image_requirements.description: Clean white backgrounds, remove pins, stands, wires, and clean imperfections.
Simple poses, face to camera, crop model face flush to top of image.
Garments should be prepped, jackets open for views, bottoms T-shirts tucked in.

summary: The page outlines image requirements for apparel, focusing on off-figure and on-figure art direction, as well as styling consistencies. It emphasizes the importance of clean backgrounds and proper garment presentation.
